document.title: Reference for `eif_name'
document.paragraph:
2SYNOPSYS
#include "eif_cecil. h" char *eif_name (EIF_TYPE_ID tid );
2DESCRIPTION The eif_name() function returns the name of the class corresponding to tid.
2RETURN VALUE A statically allocated C string which is the name of the class. If tid is invalid, it returns NULL.
2CONFORMANCE ISE Eiffel 4. 4 and later.
2COMPATIBILITY
eif_name() is equivalent to eif_name_by_tid().
2SEE ALSO
eif_type(1) , eif_type_by_reference(1), eif_type_id(1). Markup created by 1. 0, November 15, 1999.
